errorPage.title: An unexpected error occured
errorPage.message: Something went wrong. Refreshing the page might help.

404Page.pageNotFoundContent: Oh no, something went wrong. Try to enter the application <lnk>here</lnk>, through the front page

attachments.title: An error occured while uploading the file.
attachments.fileType: The file type is not allowed.

youthApplication.title: Sign up to receive your personal Summer Job Voucher
youthApplication.paragraph_1: Earning your own money is fun and easy! The Summer Job Voucher is personal and worth 325€ for the employer.

form.title: Summer Job Voucher information
form.info: Please fill in the information as it appears on your Kela card
form.schoolsPlaceholder: Choose your school from the list
form.is_unlisted_school: School not found on the list
form.termsAndConditions: I have read and accept the terms of use.
form.requiredInfo: All fields marked with * are required
form.sendItAnyway: ENG Mikäli tiedot ovat mielestäsi oikein, voit lähettää ne meille tarkastettavaksi. Palaamme asiaan kun olemme käsitelleet tietosi.

checkNotification.label: ENG Hups! Jokin tiedoista ei ole oikein
checkNotification.message: ENG Tarkistathan, että olet kirjoittanut nimesi ja henkilötunnuksesi kuten ne ovat Kela-kortissasi.

additionalInfo.title: ENG Tarkenna hakemustasi

notification.confirmedDescription: ENG Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.

additionalInfo.paragraph_1: ENG Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.
additionalInfo.paragraph_2: ENG Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.

form.additional_info_attachmentsHelper: ENG Voit lisätä korkeintaan 5 liitetiedostoa. Sallitut tiedostomuodot: pdf, jpg ja png. Maksimikoko 10MB

reasons.student_in_helsinki_but_not_resident: ENG En asu Helsingissä, mutta käyn Helsinkiläistä koulua
reasons.moving_to_helsinki: ENG En asu vielä Helsingissä, mutta olen muuttamassa Helsinkiin
reasons.underage_or_overage: ENG En kuulu iän puolesta kohderyhmään, mutta vuosiluokan puolesta kyllä

errors.required: Information is missing or is incorrect
errors.minLength: The information you entered is too short
errors.maxLength: The information you entered is too long
errors.pattern: The information you entered is in an incorrect format
errors.validate: The information you entered is in an incorrect format

thankyou.title: Excellent! You sent your information to the Summer Job Vouchers´ digital system.
thankyou.message: You have received an email with an activation link for your Summer Job Voucher, which must be activated within {{ expirationHours }} hours.
thankyou.goToFrontendPage: Go to the Summer Job Voucher front page

emailInUse.title: Oops! The email is already in use.
emailInUse.message: If you made a mistake, please wait {{ expirationHours }} hours and try again.
emailInUse.goToFrontendPage: ENG Tarkista tiedot ja lähetä kesäseteli uudelleen

alreadyAssigned.title: Oops! You already sent a Summer Job Voucher application, which is being processed now.

activated.title: Confirmation succeeded
activated.message: Great! You have submitted your information to the system and your application will be processed as soon as possible - within one month at the latest. You will receive the Summer Voucher and instructions for use by e-mail once your application has been checked!

expired.title: Oops! The confirmation link has expired
expired.message: Unfortunately, it has been more than {{ expirationHours }} hours since your registration was confirmed. Please fill in the registration form again.
expired.goToFrontendPage: Register yourself and send the Summer Job Voucher again

alreadyActivated.title: Oops! You already sent a Summer Job Voucher application, which is being processed now.

inadmissibleData.title: ENG Hups! Antamillasi tiedoilla ei voi hakea Kesäseteliä.
inadmissibleData.message: ENG Tarkistahan tietosi ja lähetä rekisteröitymislomake uudestaan.
inadmissibleData.goToFrontendPage: ENG Tarkista tiedot ja lähetä kesäseteli uudelleen
